title: Enjoy Logan Square convenience and contemporary
description: Enjoy Logan Square convenience and contemporary styling in this expansive two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium with private outdoor space and parking in prime Center City. Spanning 1,264-square-feet, this lovely sun-splashed home invites you inside with a gracious tiled foyer lined by three extra-large closets. Ahead, the corner living room provides a generous footprint for seating and dining areas alongside southern and western exposures and a private balcony with iconic skyline views. Chefs will love the windowed eat-in kitchen featuring rows of wood cabinetry, granite counters, a breakfast bar, and a fleet of stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and built-in microwave. The desirable split-bedroom layout includes a serene primary suite with a large walk-in closet and an en suite bathroom. Near the entry, a spacious secondary bedroom offers easy access to the full guest bathroom. Three zoned HVAC and an in-unit washer-dryer add comfort and convenience. This rental includes a large storage unit and one assigned parking space. 2201 Cherry Street is a pet-friendly, elevator condominium in the centrally located Logan Square neighborhood, surrounded by the best of Philadelphia living. Enjoy fantastic shopping, dining, nightlife and entertainment venues in every direction. Visit the city's renowned Parkway Museum District institutions, or amble along the Schuylkill River Trail to Boathouse Row. You'll find Trader Joe's and GIANT nearby, while Penn, Drexel and Rittenhouse Square are just minutes from your door. The 22nd Street trolley station, SEPTA Suburban Station, 30th Street Station and Schuylkill Expressway are all within blocks, providing easy access to the rest of the city and beyond. *Photos are of a similar unit 1 floor above that is also for rent (MLS#PAPH2121796)*

title: The space features high ceilings
description: This FULLY FURNISHED studio apartment is filled with character, warmth and light. The space features high ceilings, surrounded by old world charm. Original moldings blend with custom built-ins, linens mix with natural wood, and light streams through the windows, creating a calm oasis. Historic character throughout includes gorgeous Jersey Ice Cream Co's signature plaster walls, original wood floors, ornate moldings and a non-working fireplace. Smartly designed kitchen with stone counters, gas range, Sub Zero refrigerator, and brass faucet. Vintage inspired bathroom features original tile, and a clawfoot tub for soaking. Private deck, perfect for al fresco meals and the blooming gardener. A beautiful spot for a full time residence or a sweet pied-a-terre. Walking distance to everything - Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill River trail, restaurants, coffee shops, museums, shopping, universities and transportation. Located above the beloved Vernick restaurant.

title: home would be that this is a 3 story 3 bed 3.5 bath
description: Allow me to introduce 159 E. Allen St #1. A brief overview of the home would be that this is a 3 story 3 bed 3.5 bath home with finished basement, private parking, and a roof deck – but this home offers so much more. Opening the doors to what could be your future home you will be amazed at the ceiling height. To your right you have a large coat closet, and private garage access and to your left you have your first bedroom which would be perfect for a home office since it brings in a ton of natural light. The garage has plenty of storage and a plug for your electric car! The basement is finished and is currently being used as a gym. Since the home is only 5 years old all the systems are in great working order and have been regularly maintained. Going up to your main living area on the 2nd floor you have a large living room with tons of Pella windows bringing in a ton of natural light which is perfect for plants, beautiful dark hardwood floors, modern warm gold lighting with an adjustable dimmer and ultra-high ceilings. The kitchen offers all white quartz countertops with island seating, a very large white farm sink with touchless faucet, under cabinet lighting, stainless steel GE appliances, upgraded marble backsplash and last but not least white shaker cabinets with gold accents. This floor also offers a balcony connected to the kitchen, which is perfect for your morning coffee. On to the 3rd floor where you have a large bedroom with lots of closet space. Did I mention you have a view of the city from here? Now let’s talk about this primary bed with a private bath. The bathroom has dual sinks AND dual shower heads! The walk-in closet is a game changer, the seller’s upgraded this when the home was built. Also, on this floor you have your washer and dryer along with a hall bathroom with a deep tub. Last but certainly not least we head up to the roof deck. You have an amazing view of the city from this home, it is perfect for entertaining since there is a wet bar right there when you need it. Also, this home comes with a green roof which is beautiful to look at but also improves the longevity of the roof. Some other quick things to mention about this home is that it is in a gated community, you have a front door with keyless entry, wired Vivint home security with doorbell remote access to open and close garage door on your phone. There are 5 years left on the tax abatement as well. If you buy this home, you will be so close to so many fantastic restaurants and live music venues such as Frankford Hall, The Filmore, Johnny Brenda’s, LMNO and so many more. You have easy access to 95 and 676 to downtown, also you are a quick walk to the Septa train station.

title: This FULLY FURNISHED studio apartment
description: This FULLY FURNISHED studio apartment is filled with character, warmth and light. The space features high ceilings, surrounded by old world charm. Private deck, perfect for al fresco meals and the blooming gardener. A beautiful spot for a full time residence or a sweet pied-a-terre. Walking distance to everything - Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill River trail, restaurants, coffee shops, museums, shopping, universities and transportation. Located above the beloved Vernick restaurant.

title: Completely renovated 1 bed/1 bath, 900 sq ft condo
description: Available August 1st. Completely renovated 1 bed/1 bath, 900 sq ft condo which includes 1 garage parking spot. Located in the Pier 3 building on the scenic Delaware waterfront. The unit has 13 foot ceilings and has been completely redone: new natural hardwood floors throughout, high end tile and shower in the bathroom, new appliances & granite counter in kitchen. New custom window treatments and lighting throughout. Central air, washer/dryer in unit. The 2nd floor condo is situated at the very end of the pier, far enough to drown out noise of the bustling city. The view is of the building’s newly renovated courtyard which includes your private patio. The amenities include a 24 hour concierge, an indoor heated pool, a gym, garage parking, and a sprawling community deck with beautiful South/East views of the river/city. You will not find a place with this much access to the water in the city. Location is excellent. The entire waterfront has just been renovated with a beautiful walking/biking trail. You are a 5 minute walk to historic and trendy old city and a 2 minute walk to Penn’s landing which has fun activities year round (ice skating, park, museums, and restaurants…check out the new Liberty Point for a great outdoor happy hour). Very close to public transport and 1 minute drive to exit onto 95 N.

This luxury unit boasts a spacious living/dining room with hardwood floors. Chef inspired kitchen featuring granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, and center island w/ double sided waterfalls granite countertops. This level also features two generously appointed bedroom suites each with spacious closets, and large full baths. The unit includes large rear outdoor balcony. Just steps away from the Broad Street Line, Divine Lorraine, Osteria, Vie and all of the Fairmount/Art Museum shops and restaurants!

title: Welcome to Locust Point
description: Welcome to Locust Point. This building is safely centrally located to all that Philadelphia has to offer. In walking distance to the shops and restaurants of Rittenhouse, this unit sits in a prime location. To the west, sits the Schuylkill River Park, trail, and dog park for a bunch of fun outdoor activities. If you go just over the river, you have access to University City's sports leagues (soccer, baseball, flag football, frisbee, tennis) at Penn's Field. To the North, you have the Philadelphia Museum of Art and loads of other museums and galleries. Inside is a spacious loft with an in-unit washer and dryer. Perfect for city living, the ceilings are high, the windows are large, and there is plenty of space to unwind. The unit comes with a pre-installed tv wall mount, floating cabinet beneath tv, and dishwasher. Make sure to take advantage of the building's gym (free to all residents). While there is no on-site parking for this unit, there is a full-time, covered, secure parking garage available around the corner (less than 1-minute walk) for $200/month. Bike parking available. In addition to the closet space in the unit, there is additional private storage space on the same floor. Pets accepted on a case by case basis, with an additional $50/month fee. There is a fenced-in pet grass area in front of the building for exercise/bathroom activity.

title: Beautiful Bright Pet Friendly 1-Bedroom!
description:
I'm sad to say I'll be needing to move and am looking for someone to takeover the lease (currently signed until July 2023) for my apartment! I have loved living here and am excited to pass it along to someone who will appreciate it as much as I have. Here are the specs:
- One bedroom
- available for a July 1, July 15, or August 1 move-in
- $1100 per month + gas for cooking and heat + electric
- easy and abundant street parking *without a permit*
- pet friendly (I believe I pay a monthly pet fee for my cat and dog so rent may actually be slightly cheaper if you have no pets-- would need to be discussed with the landlord directly)
- has a tub! Maybe you think it's silly to include this but tubs are for some reason rare in one bedrooms here in West Philly so it's really a find
- shared yard & large front porch
- hardwood floors throughout
- great natural light with two large west facing windows that look out onto the backyard
- unit is second floor, rear, so it's quiet as it's removed up off of the street
- easy transit access to both the 34 and 13 trollies, as well as several buses
- my neighbors are really amazing-- both in the building and in the adjacent ones. It's really a sweet block
The bedroom easily fits a queen or king bed. Right now we have a queen bed, very large dresser, book shelf, and two arm chairs in it. There are two closets in the bedroom, one the size of a typical non-walk-in closet, the other much larger with storage space above and behind where clothes would hang.
The living room and kitchen are open into one another as shown in pictures, but large enough for a table and eating area plus a designated living room space with couches and chairs. We also have a "landing nook" with some storage set up and room for shoes and coats just inside of the front door.
Bathroom has a tub and great shower pressure, as well as a large frosted window so it also gets lovely natural light.
This space is great for a single person with pets or a couple.
Email me for more photos, a video walk through, or to stop by and view in person. Please, serious inquiries only!

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. title: Welcome home to this STUNNING property in the heart of Roxborough.
description: Welcome home to this STUNNING property in the heart of Roxborough. No expense was spared through the modern minimalist design. With a freshly landscaped curb appeal and new concrete walkway, enter the front door to an open concept living space. Flowing throughout the entire house are brand new herringbone hardwood floors. Straight through you will find a dining area and kitchen that boasts new appliances, quartz countertops, an ivy hill glazed porcelain backsplash, and custom Mediterranean slab cabinets that are eco-friendly, stain resistant, and easy to clean with brass and black fixtures. Through black French doors off the kitchen, you will find a midcentury modern style den with large new windows and sloped 10ft ceilings. The space can be used as a bonus room, office, or sunroom perfect for entertaining. Additionally off the kitchen is a half bathroom featuring a gorgeous Art Deco emerald tile accent wall and white round penny tile floors. Upstairs, there are 3 bedrooms featuring ample closet space. The floor is complete with a laundry area and a pristinely designed full bathroom with brass fixtures and Spanish porcelain checkered floors. The house is complete with a partially finished basement- just add flooring and it is ready to be made into an additional living and entertaining area! Brand new drywall throughout, new HVAC (2022,) ductwork, hot water heater (2022,) and electric. Driveway in the back for easy access. Close to major roadways, public transportation, Fairmount Park and Valley Green. Just a short drive away from Main St Manayunk and Plymouth Meeting Metroplex. Make your appointment today- you do not want to miss this one!
